        Parameters:

        teamCount - The amount of teams.
        Returns:

                                  org.bukkit.Color color,
                                  java.lang.String name)
        Lets a group of players equip a chestplate in the color of their team.
        Parameters:

        color - Their team color.
        name - Their team name.

      • placeTeam

        public static void placeTeam(java.util.List<org.bukkit.entity.Player> players,
                             org.bukkit.Location location,
                             int xOffset,
                             int zOffset)
        Places a group of players to the new spawn point for their team. They will be frozen, until the game starts.
        Parameters:
        players - The group of players.
        location - Their team spawn.
        xOffset - Possible x-offset of the spawn point.
        zOffset - Possible z-offset of the spawn point.

      • runNextTimer

        public static void runNextTimer(int secondsTillNext)
        Runs a recursive timer for all players in the lobby. If the time is up, a new game will be selected.
        Parameters:
        secondsTillNext - How many seconds to wait until the next game.

      • runStartTimer

        public static void runStartTimer(int secondsTillStart,
                                 int secondsTillEnd)
        Runs a recursive timer for all players in the minigame. If the time is up, they will be unfrozen and the end timer starts.
        Parameters:
        secondsTillStart - How many seconds to wait until game start.
        secondsTillEnd - How many seconds to wait until game end.

      • runEndTimer

        private static void runEndTimer(int secondsTillEnd)
        Runs a recursive timer for all players in the minigame. If the time is up, the game will end.
        Parameters:
        secondsTillEnd - How many seconds to wait until game end.
